short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A ruler that overlays a website to help you read & retain information. Helpful for people who are neurodivergent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A common technique recommended for people who struggle to read and retain the information as they read is to use a ruler to read every line.
This add-on creates a line across the webpage that follows the cursor and darkens the lower half to recreate this technique.
